TranscodingPresets.Preset: -sws 9 -of lavf -lavfopts format=mp4 -vf scale=320:-2,dsize=320:-2,harddup -ovc x264 -x264encopts bitrate=500:vbv_maxrate=1500:vbv_bufsize=2000:nocabac:me=umh:subq=6:frameref=6:trellis=1:level_idc=30:global_header:threads=4 -oac faac -faacopts mpeg=4:object=2:br=64:raw -channels 2 -srate 48000

-sws 9 -of lavf -lavfopts format=mp4 -vf scale=480:-2,dsize=480:-2,harddup -ovc x264 -x264encopts bitrate=1000:vbv_maxrate=1500:vbv_bufsize=2000:nocabac:me=umh:subq=6:frameref=6:trellis=1:level_idc=30:global_header:threads=4 -oac faac -faacopts mpeg=4:object=2:br=128:raw -channels 2 -srate 48000
